sense.name: Physically place on object in a location.
sense.examples: Deposit the suitcase on the bench and leave. Eggs are deposited first and then Salmon sperm soon follows. I have deposited everything I own of my grandmother's in a box in the bank.

sense.name: Put money specifically into a bank account.
sense.examples: I wish to deposit this check in my account. She deposits her paycheck every month. He deposited all of the mob cash in foreign bank accounts.
